This setting controls the automatic refresh of all feeds
Controls the appearance of notifications in case of new feed content
Select a ringtone that will be played on new feed content
Controls if there will be vibration on new feed content
Show unread feed entries above read entries
Time that the entries will be kept
The entries that are older than the given date will be deleted
Download all pictures and store them locally
Present rss entries in black text on white background
Refreshes all feeds after opening the application
Hide entries from the widget if they have been read
Additional tabs for favorite and all feed-entries
The selected file could not be imported.
The export has failed. Make sure you have a writable SD card mounted.
The selected file is not valid for import.
Do you really want to delete this feed and all of its entries?
Use SD-card (if present) - this will close the application. Please restart it manually.
